about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Not all gifts are the same. Some whisper what words can never say.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Forma, we believe that every fingerprint tells a story, every touch holds a memory, and every heart deserves to leave an everlasting mark. We transform priceless moments into timeless works of art that speak to the soul and last forever.

process.title: Our Process
process.content: Using premium German skin-safe silicone, we create precise molds of body parts — the hand of a loved one, a child's tiny fingerprint, or a mother's gentle palm — and turn them into fine jewelry or 3D sculptures filled with emotion.

quality.title: Quality & Craftsmanship
quality.content: Each piece is crafted with the precision of an artist, the passion of a lover, and the elegance of gold. It's not just a gift… It's a symbol of love, memory, and eternity.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: We collaborate with artists, sculptors, and families who wish to preserve their memories in a meaningful way. Our creations unite art, science, and humanity, ensuring your mark remains eternal.

about.closing: Because some memories are meant to be touched. Forma – crafting impressions that never fade.
